column5: Hey, just a quick question regardng fly tying, where is the best place to go around Toronto to pick up fly tying material at decent prices?  Ebay looks great with all the cheap stuff, but I cant wait for shipping as i have a few days off work and want to spend two days tying flies, hahaha.
Might be a good place to start......  http://www.wilsonsto...09/Default.aspx
Thank you very much Spiel, you know where to find me tomorrow, haha!
If you go to Wilson's ask to speak to Billy. He's a great guy and a wealth of information.

He's also a great rod builder too as well as an amazing fly caster.  Dozer, if you're in the Scarlem area, you can check out Angling Specialties (Kennedy and Passmore area).  There's a decent amount of fly tying stuff to be had.  Unfortunately the shop may be permanently closing November/December.
